From:

Subject: RE: NM 
Date: Tue, 23 Feb 2021 15:38:51 +0000 
Attachments: Ex._A.pdf 
Thanks, all. I'm attaching the NPA, in case that's useful. 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, February 23, 2021 10:36 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: NPA 
Great, thanks to you both. 
jump in next. 
â€”  let's touch base after sends edits around so we can figure out who will 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, February 23, 2021 10:35 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: NPA 
My laptop isn't letting me connect to the network this morning, but my plan is to review as soon as that's fixed (which 
should be in about 30 minutes). 
On Feb 23, 2021, at 10:32 AM, 
I will look now. 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, February 23, 2021 10:13 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: NPA 
> 
wrote: 
Thanks, .  Has anyone started to review this yet? I'm tied up for a bit if someone else has a chance to look 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, February 23, 2021 2:02 AM 
To: 
Subject: NPA 
All, 
>; 
EFTA00021378

Attached is the most recent draft of the NPA brief. Apologies for the delay, I really struggled with this one. I think our 
arguments in the first half are strong, but I'm really not wild about the second half. Would very much appreciate your 
comments/edits. I've also flagged a few issues for consideration/discussion. If you're able to review tomorrow morning, 
that would be great. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00021379
